title: Adwr Cadarn

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adwr Cadarn was an elven scout from the Cadarn Clan.[1] He was sent to Prifddinas along with four other scouts during the Fourth Age to uncover the cause of the communication breakdown between Prifddinas and the other elven colonies that had settled to the east of Arandar in Misthalin, Asgarnia, and Kandarin.[1]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Adwr

Adwr Cadarn was an elven scout from the Cadarn Clan.[1] He was sent to Prifddinas along with four other scouts during the Fourth Age to uncover the cause of the communication breakdown between Prifddinas and the other elven colonies that had settled to the east of Arandar in Misthalin, Asgarnia, and Kandarin.[1]

Adwr and the other four scouts travelled through the Underground Pass that ran beneath the mountain range separating Tirannwn from Kandarin[1] and saw the chaos of an elven civil war in Prifddinas.[2] Only Adwr survived the return trip[3] to spread the news of Iorwerth Clan's treason and subsequent conquering of Prifddinas and the Tower of Voices.[2]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 The great divide, Old School RuneScape. "Soon it was decided to send five members of the Cadarn clan through the Well of Voyage, to recover any information that could tell us what was happening."
  2. ^ 2.0 2.1 The great divide, Old School RuneScape. "He told us of the chaos he had seen; elves killing elves in the streets of Prifddinas and the seizing of the Tower of Voices by clan Iorwerth."
  3. ^ The great divide, Old School RuneScape. "After a few weeks, Adwr returned, the only one of the five scouts that made it back."
